mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Images (imgID, serviceID, imgOriName, imgChanName, imgExt, imgUptime, imgSize) VALUES (#{imgID}, #{serviceID}, #{imgOriName}, #{imgChanName}, #{imgExt}, #{imgUptime}, #{imgSize})
